primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The recovery of the 'divine spark' or 'image of God' within the human person through self-recognition and a return to one's true nature.

tekstueel_bewijs: we shall find peace only when we claim it

object.identificatie: The 'God in us' / Divine Image / Peace

tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Sin is treated as 'dirt' or 'grime'—a surface-level marring of an inherently good core, rather than a total ontological death.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: Social progress and democratic freedom in America.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: American Society / Clergy
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The internal 'God in us' is used as the engine for social/democratic improvement.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God purposed you in his heart
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We shall find peace only when we claim it

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is a 'Recruitment' narrative. It focuses on awakening the hearer's desire (Vouloir) to return to their true self, assuming the power (Pouvoir) is already latent within them.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from S2 (nasty/brutish) to ~S2 (decency) to S1 (God in us).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in the 'birthright'—the ontological fact that the image is never lost, only submerged.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Low. S2 is described as 'dirt' that can be washed off or a 'rug' to be swept under.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using the language of 'God' and 'Gospel,' the actantial subject is consistently the human being who must 'arise,' 'claim,' and 'listen.' God is the object to be found or the helper who believes in us.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: the presence of God becomes our desired climate
the power to respond was there

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God purposed you in his heart

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The Prodigal Son is used as a model for the hearer's willpower rather than a recipient of unexpected grace.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The Father's running is the primary act; the son's 'arising' is a dead-end that only leads to a prepared speech, which the Father ignores to bestow grace.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Pelagianism—the idea that the human will can initiate the return to God.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon is coherent as a 'Hero's Journey' of self-discovery, but incoherent as a Christian proclamation of the Cross.
spanning_punten: The quote 'strength which thou and thou alone can give' clashes with 'the power to respond was there.'

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: He believed that there resided enough of God in us so that what he had to say could reach us.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is replaced by a 'part of God' already in the person.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is a 'marring' or 'disfigurement,' not death.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon functions as a psychological encouragement. The hearer is the Subject, the 'God-image' is the Object, and Jesus is the Helper.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The hearer is the one who 'arises and goes.'
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: God is the seeker who finds the lost sheep.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'I will arise and go,' use 'While I was yet a sinner, Christ came to find me.'

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: Hearer as the 'princeling' who just needs to wash up.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize the dead-end of the pig trough; the son had no 'power' until the Father acted.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus on how God gives the 'can' to the 'cannot.'

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Sin as a grave from which one cannot climb out.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: Without a 'Heavy Opponent,' the 'Subject' (God) is unnecessary.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: Ethics (standing up straighter) is fused with Soteriology.
narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. God finds the dead. 2. The found person stands up.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon has a beautiful rhetorical flow and strong social conscience, but it risks leaving the hearer with the burden of their own salvation by locating the 'engine' of grace within the human soul rather than in the external act of Christ.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: A rhetorical analysis would praise the use of Langston Hughes and Stevenson; semiotics reveals these are 'Helpers' for a humanistic subject.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis might focus on the 'Image of God' in Genesis; semiotics shows how that image is used as a 'modal competence' belonging to the human.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas exposes that 'Jesus' in this sermon is not the Savior but a 'Savoir-faire' (one who knows the truth about us).

appendices.notities: The sermon leans heavily on 'Exemplarism,' using the Prodigal Son as a psychological archetype for self-improvement.
